title: Church, Inc
description:
There is a mass exodus today away from organized religion, with many people forming home churches. Why is this happening? Does the problem lie with these \\\"disgruntled\\\" individuals, or is it with the churches themselves? Find the answer in this revealing book. But be warned, its conclusions will upset you!
